Articles.Content:
Kerbal engineers have finally succeeded in building a rover that is succesfull on pretty much any celestial body, except for those who are described as low gravity space potatoes. It has also been outfitted with a skycrane, one for parachuted landings and lower gravity body's (Light Skycrane). And also one for higher gravity non-atmospheric body's (Heavy Skycrane) this one can even land on Tylo! Both have the same action groups for making the disposal of your skycrane a lot easier. Custom one should be activated once your rover is on the ground, this one shuts the engines down, then go to full thrust and activate custom 2, this will reactivate the engines and also separate your rover from the skycrane. All types can be acquired with or without Mechjeb. Please do enjoy your brand new rover!!

Universal Rover Mark II

Looks nice, going to have to try it out.
